name: Snake 3D (itch) (Towacchi)
description:
Controls:

  • Movement  - Arrow Keys
  • Change Depth - W/S
  • Auto Mode - A
  • Increase speed when in Auto - Shift

Made for college learning purposes on p5.js, with the objective to reproduce the Snake game mechanic  on 3D.

Credits:   Song -  Deparment Store by Nick Short
